Back to Franz Liszt

Franz Liszt

La Romanesca, S. 252a

c. 1839 · LW A14 · R. 91

[IMSLP]

This is an arrangement of a Spanish dance, which also exists in a later version (S. 252b). The work was formerly catalogued as S. 247, under the belief that the dance was of Italian origin.

Recommended editions

  • New Liszt Edition (Editio Musica Budapest) · Suppl. 10 · Z. A/B 14505 · ed. Adrienne Kaczmarczyk / Ágnes Sas

Duration: 8' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5
